page.title: 10The Village Primary School-2
page.content: {Other areas of the curriculum}are Science, Topic work, Music, Physical Education and Religious Education. In the last few years an increasing emphasis has been put on the use of {modern technology in school.}The children are being educated in the use of the{computer as a tool}and also have some elementary work on electronics. Petham School has its own Kitchen where a{mid-day meal}is prepared for about 40 children at a cost of 60p a day. The remainder have a packed lunch sent by parents and a few go home. Four mornings a week commence with a{religious service}with hymns, prayers and usually a story based on the Christian faith and/or with a moral basis.{Games}of rounders, cricket, non-stop cricket,netball and football are played at different seasons.There is no hall for PE yet.
